extension.summary: Launch Parsec from OSMC/Kodi on your Raspberry Pi.
extension.description: Launch Parsec from OSMC/Kodi on your Raspberry Pi. Easily configure your Parsec connection from within the addon configuration menu. Automatically exit back into OSMC/Kodi after your Parsec session has ended. Seamlessly launch directly into your Parsec host without having to enter login or host selection information by enabling Headless Client Mode.
